showerReviews.reviewText: … 34 reset. Food is spectacular. Shower (1), was clean, eat in dining area, lots of local hand crafted made foods, bakery on site, Diesel fuel out back, parking lot has deep pot holes, avoid rain filled holes, they're deep. No issues parking …
Excellent service, food , fuel, shower & free parking.
$9.10 for the SHOWER well worth it. Clean towels provided if you ask. UPDATE The second time I used the shower there was no presure and it never got warm unlike the first time. …

… lot. Always has parking available. Nice and quiet. 75 Gallons for a free shower. Basic, but very clean. Take fleet cards (such as Comdata) inside with your truck information (truck number, mileage, etc) to get the pump activated for use.
… There is a shower. $7.50 isn't bad. Just got inside.... Have a floor fan, blowing cool air... But still just uncomfortable. Lovely place otherwise!!
Great place to park for a break. Shower was a great price. Only $9.10! Great food at a decent price.
Good food and lots of parking. Shower has no Hot water. I stay here often. Won't be getting any more showers.
Shower was clean and it costs $9. Good luck y’all ✌️
Great service, truck parking, only one shower but very clean.
Clean shower, excellent deli food

showerReviews.reviewText: The parking space is great for trucks unfortunately if you get there late and  need a shower , You will not get one because the worker will not leave the register (only I worker at night) to clean the showrr. So you can shower when next …

… I’m a truck driver for over 18 years, I stop at your place a couple a time a years for fueling,shower and restaurant. Today I travel with my son 11 years old, I put fuel in my truck 75 gallon and go inside for a shower. The lady a the …

… was very friendly. Even though a staff member from the restaurant side didn't have the most pleasant attitude, I decided to deliver my load and drive all the way back here, because I wanted a nice hot shower. My options were limited and …
It’s great truck stop and have a more then 200 parking for trucks , they have a shower, restaurant and laundry in here

Always able to park here and just took a nice hot shower here for the first time. Been here numerous times before but decided I needed a hot shower after a long drive and OMG it was amazing. No slimy feeling due to water softener, great …

We visited this place for showers, which cost $15 and included a towel, bath mat, washcloth, and bar soap. Because there aren't many shower options nearby, I would've hoped for better attention to detail. Overall, the showers were decent, …

Very good truck stop. Clean shower with good water pressure only 10$. Well stocked store. Huge and easy truck parking. Friendly and polite staff inside store and restaurant as well as guys working at the Fuel pumps. Will definitely come …

… I met the owner once. I asked the cashier for towels because my shower hadn't been attended yet. Owner overheard me and told her to give me the shower for free. I told him it was ok because the shower was perfectly clean, but he insisted on …

Restaurant is great, truck stop showers, not so much. Walked in for a shower, paid $15, lady behind the counter proceeded to ask me for my truck keys, CDL, or cash to hold as a deposit for the shower. Immediately told her to refund my $15 …

… was really good and waitress was great and friendly. The truck stop was nice plenty of parking. A little pricey for a shower $10.00 plus a deposit of 5$ . No discount for team shower. Small shower room and 1 little towel. Staff at fuel …

showerReviews.reviewText: $12 shower with zero water pressure, I felt dirtier coming out then I did going in. The stench downstairs is unreal, you’re better off using “Dude Wipes” than showering here.

I was a professional truck driver for many years and traveled the many many miles and stopped at many a truck stop my showers were often given to me for my fill up !! I'm now retired and travel as an Overlander camper I was surprised to say …

… so nice but not nice enough to stop here again! My husband and I have gone in a few times and they were extremely rude but this last time we went in was to take showers. First of all my husbands shower was disgusting the floor was …
Nice little old timey truck stop. 50 Gallons for a free shower. Showers are old school. Nothing special, but if you're a hot mess, they get the job done. People here always seem pretty cool.

showerReviews.reviewText:
This is how your employee's think a clean shower is.
Told them I wouldn't even let my dog set foot in there. Make sure your Tetanus shot is up to date. …

Not a truck stop. Not many places for a semi to park, but easy to maneuver a big rig to the diesel pumps.
Clean and new facility. Clean restrooms. …

The management needs to go check the shower and the bathroom. I doubt neither have been swept or mopped in the past 3 days. The base of the toilets are filthy, and the shower floor was covered with dirt yesterday when I was there. I bought …
Best service center I have been to. The prices are affordable and everything was clean. The workers were also friendly and helpful.

I didn't get their names, but the two women working the night shift tonight were incredibly sweet and hospitable to my family and I on our RV road-trip! The shower here is awesome, too! Trick to getting hot water is to turn it ALL the way around. Kids showered first and didn't know that. Wife showered before me and figured it out.

I'm a truck driver I paid for a shower the shower had not been cleaned and I  requested the worker to clean it he smiled and said sure sir I'll reclean it thinking he going to clean it right well he didn't  but I dealt with it 3 min of warm …

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice and quiet place. Clean parking lot for 20 -25 trucks. Good people, usual snacks, drinks. Shower 20$, or 100 gal fuels.

Nice & quiet place to stay overnight. People are friendly. Walmart, planet fitness, chipotle is 2,5miles away from here.
Truck parking 6/10
Food 3/10
Shower 2/10 cause they are not that clean but it’s only 5$ which is awesome

I'm in the shower, freezing cold and covered in soap. The water has shut off twice now with a 10 minute wait between each attempt. I don't even know if the next attempt will have enough for me to rinse and get out. …
I like this stop. Food is okay not special. The service is good. Plenty of parking good location if you’re in Plattsburgh. They take EFS cards!!! And free sandwich or shower with fill-up!!

… phones instead of waiting on people failed to tell me that you needed a hundred gallons of fuel in order to get a free shower I put 90 gallons in and they still charged me the place is dirty the shower is dirty and watch the dates on the …
Mobil gas.  Some prepared food served.   Open 24 hours.   Shower available
Staff are very nice and smiling. Not the cleanest place to shower though.
Best rest stop in the area.  Has a shower and a sofa to relax with.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice place to stop and eat right off the highway but if you’re going to charge $10 for a shower which i know isn’t much the least you could do is clean them. Didn’t even offer a refund when i told them about it! 5/20/25
Best shower I've ever had on the road. Best price, too! $10.

… coffee choices and the food looks great, although I haven't tried it yet. Maybe next time. Very clean and they do have a shower that comes with 50 gallons of fuel. Not much parking, however, since this isn't Pilot or TA, you'll find a spot.

… . Brand new gas and big truck diesel pumps with DEF pumps. (Bring fleet cards inside.) 50 Gallons gets you a free shower. One shower inside (brand new, very clean!). Clean towels and hamper for used towels are just outside the shower room.

… but plenty of big rig spots, gas, diesel, def at the pumps, (Inside) "although missing few options" 2 sparkling showers, a subway restaurant and a standard sub stand, this stop is the most decent within the state of Vermont at the moment …
Very good place for a sleep, shower and eat and the best coffee
Nice little place to take break, truckers can stop for fuel and take a shower. And get a good cup of coffee
